item.title: Raichur municipal head resigns to join govt service
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Priyanka Nayak, the President of the Sindhanur Municipal Council in Raichur district, has submitted her resignation from her position. As a young leader supported by the Congress party, she assumed office as president in February 2025. Holding a degree in engineering, Priyanka has recently qualified in a competitive examination for a government position, which prompted her to submit her resignation.
After obtaining this qualification, she decided to pursue a career in government servic...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
